CustomField.description: For tracking. How the Confirmed Reference Disposition came to be collected. Either via the "Onboarding CSAT Survey" in Klaviyo, the "Growth Reference Confirmation Request Survey" in Gainsight, or from Marketing or Sales. This field is loaded via Gainsight automation as confirmed reference dispositions are collected from CSAT and Growth surveys. If this field is null, but a Confirmed Reference Disposition is populated, then it was populated manually.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How the Confirmed Reference Disposition came to be collected. Set by automation to "Onboarding CSAT Survey" or "Growth Reference Confirmation Survey" if responses were collected by either of those 2 mediums. If Confirmed Reference Disposition is populated but this field is blank, assume Disposition was input manually Sales, CS, or Marketing.
CustomField.label: Confirmed Reference Source
